mapper.sql: iid, id, question, answer, item1, item2, item3, item4, explains, url, wrongnumber
mapper.select:
select
from examination_question4 order by id ASC limit #{start},#{pagesize}

select
from examination_question4 where question like "%"#{keywords}"%" limit #{start},#{pagesize}

select
from examination_question4 where item3!=" " and answer<5

select
from examination_question4 order by wrongnumber desc limit 0,100
mapper.insert: insert into examination_question4 (iid, id, question, answer, item1, item2, item3, item4, explains, url, wrongnumber) values (#{iid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{explains,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrongnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update examination_question4 set id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item1 = #{item1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item2 = #{item2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item3 = #{item3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item4 = #{item4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, explains = #{explains,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wrongnumber = #{wrongnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} where iid = #{iid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
